bill.title: Recognizing Hispanic Heritage Month and celebrating the heritage and culture of Latinos in the United States and the immense contributions of Latinos to the United States.
bill.description: This resolution recognizes (1) the celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month; and (2) the integral role of Latinos and their manifold heritage in the economy, culture, and identity of the United States.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

subjects.subject_name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
